author: CaptainBrick33
title: A great minifigure for a cheap price!
review:
For my first review, I will be taking a look at the magazine gift included in the latest issue of the Ninjago magazine. This time, we are getting a season 11 version of Jay!

Building experience

The assembly was very simple, since it's just a minifigure and a couple of accessories. Took me half a minute.

Parts

There isn't anything too special in terms of parts, except for Jay's hood piece, which only appeared in the expensive Land Bounty set. A pair of silver shurikens is also included.

Minifigure

Obviously, the only minifigure included in this set is SotFs Jay. I am very happy that Jay is complete with his armour and nicely printed dual-moulded mask, which we don't see too often in cheap sets (looking at you, Lloyd's Journey). The minifigure itself looks really nice and I have no complaints about it. Jay also comes with a silver katana and a flail.

Conclusion

Overall, I really like this magazine gift. If you don't have this version of Jay, I strongly recommend this one. I paid 13.00PLN for it, (around 3 Euro), which is a fantastic price for what you get. However, if you already have this minifigure, you can easily pass on it.
